name: Global_Variables.FOPEN_MODEAPPEND
comment: "a": Opens for writing at the end of the file (appending) without removing the EOF marker before writing new data to the file; creates the file first if it doesnot exist.

name: Global_Variables.FOPEN_MODEBINARY
comment: "b": Open in binary (untranslated) mode.

name: Global_Variables.FOPEN_MODEPLUS
comment: "+": Opens for reading and writing

name: Global_Variables.FOPEN_MODEREAD
comment: "r": Opens for reading. If the file does not exist or cannot be found, the call fails.

name: Global_Variables.FOPEN_MODETEXT
comment: "t": Open in text (translated) mode.

name: Global_Variables.FOPEN_MODEWRITE
comment: "w": Opens an empty file for writing. If the given file exists, its contents are destroyed.
